title: Getting DC-ed with normal ping and good internet connection in the past two weeks
body:
Hi all,

In the past couple of weeks i am getting disconnected or my champ just won't respond to any commands but i can still watch the game without any delays, mu ping and fps are normal and i can even chat in game. So what the hell? Does anyone else have these issues?

replies.body:
What you're experiencing is most likely caused by *Packet Loss* that originates either on your network or along your network routing to our servers. This is most often caused by certain network settings that caused an inconsistent connection, therefore working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to configure your network for League may fix this.

Let me know if it did.
